of plasmid ratios may be required for each transfer plasmid; an equimolar ratio is a good starting point. Zhang Lab uses a 4:3:2 transfer : psPAX2 : pMD2.G ratio that approximates an equimolar ratio for lentiCas9-blast, lentiGuide-Puro \u0026 lentciCRISPR v2 plasmids. With lentiCas9-blast, 4:2:1, 9:8:1, 7.5:1.5:4 ratios all result in similar titres (+/- 20% of 4:3:2), around 1-2e6 TU/ml.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Lentivirus production & concentration
